description: This adorable footage shows a young pooch (pictured) desperately trying to coax his feline friend out of his wooden cat box. But the moment the cat appears he quick dashes away in fright
title: Puppy desperately tries to lure a cat out of a wooden box
title_page: Puppy desperately tries to lure a cat out of a wooden box | Daily Mail Online
text:
This is the adorable moment an eager puppy corners a cat in a wooden box - only to flee the moment it re-appears.
The pooch, named Daisy, spends a good half-a-minute trying to coax cat Millie out, its tail wagging and paws pacing in anticipation.
It sticks its head inside the cat's box but doesn't dare tread all the way in.
Then, as Millie suddenly escapes from her hideaway, Daisy is sent scarpering away in fear.
All this is much to the amusement of owner Ronnie Reed, 52, who can be heard laughing in the background at Daisy's own cowardice.
Ronnie says that the young Cavachon regularly chases Millie around in a bid to 'kiss' her.
Grumpy Millie however is rarely in the mood for games and often hides in the cat house.
It's clear which of the animals is the 'boss' of the duo.
